channel.title: Lactuca Sativa on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Lactuca Sativa on funPlantGenes

item.title: LsAP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LsAP2 Gene Name: APETALA2 Genome: Species: Lactuca sativa Functional Descriptions: The lettuce APETALA2 (LsAP2) gene regulates leaf morphology.

item.title: LsGLK
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: LG4_347011 Gene Symbol: LsGLK Gene Name: Genome: Lsat_Salinas_v8 Species: Lactuca sativa Functional Descriptions: Alternative splicing triggered by the insertion of a CACTA transposon attenuates LsGLK and leads to the development of pale-green leaves in lettuce.

item.title: LsKN1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: LG7600774 Gene Symbol: LsKN1 Gene Name: knotted 1 Genome: Lsat_Salinas_v11 Species: Lactuca sativa Functional Descriptions: We report the genetic cloning of a key regulator (LsKN1) of heading in lettuce, which is homologous to the knotted 1 (KN1) gene in maize.

item.title: LsMYB15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: LG3315676 Gene Symbol: LsMYB15 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Lactuca sativa Functional Descriptions: LsMYB15 Regulates Bolting in Leaf Lettuce (Lactuca sativa L.

item.title: LsNRL4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: LG4_398401 Gene Symbol: LsNRL4 Gene Name: Genome: Lsat_Salinas_v8 Species: Lactuca sativa Functional Descriptions: LsNRL4 enhances photosynthesis and decreases leaf angles in lettuce.

item.title: LsRGL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Lsat_1_v5_gn_2_69481.1 Gene Symbol: LsRGL1 Gene Name: RGA-LIKE1 Genome: Species: Lactuca sativa Functional Descriptions: GA signaling protein LsRGL1 interacts with the abscisic acid signaling-related gene LsWRKY70 to affect the bolting of leaf lettuce.

item.title: LsSAW1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: LG4_402589 Gene Symbol: LsSAW1 Gene Name: SAWTOOTH 1 Genome: Lsat_Salinas_v8 Species: Lactuca sativa Functional Descriptions: Loss-of-function of SAWTOOTH 1 (LsSAW1) affects leaf dorsiventrality genes to promote leafy heads in lettuce.

item.title: LsSOC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Lsat_1_v5_gn_7_6780.1 Gene Symbol: LsSOC1 Gene Name: SUPPRESSOR OF OVEREXPRESSION OF CONSTANS1 Genome: Species: Lactuca sativa Functional Descriptions: LCM-seq reveals the crucial role of LsSOC1 in heat-promoted bolting of lettuce.

item.title: LsWRKY70
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LsWRKY70 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Lactuca sativa Functional Descriptions: GA signaling protein LsRGL1 interacts with the abscisic acid signaling-related gene LsWRKY70 to affect the bolting of leaf lettuce.

item.title: RLL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RLL1 Gene Name: Red Lettuce Leaves 1 Genome: Lsat_Salinas_v8 Species: Lactuca sativa Functional Descriptions: The characterization of multiple polymorphic genes in this study provides the necessary molecular resources for the rational breeding of lettuce cultivars with distinct levels of red pigments and green cultivars with high levels of health-promoting flavonoids.

item.title: RLL2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RLL2 Gene Name: Red Lettuce Leaves 2 Genome: Lsat_Salinas_v8 Species: Lactuca sativa Functional Descriptions: The characterization of multiple polymorphic genes in this study provides the necessary molecular resources for the rational breeding of lettuce cultivars with distinct levels of red pigments and green cultivars with high levels of health-promoting flavonoids.

item.title: RLL3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RLL3 Gene Name: Red Lettuce Leaves 3 Genome: Lsat_Salinas_v8 Species: Lactuca sativa Functional Descriptions: The characterization of multiple polymorphic genes in this study provides the necessary molecular resources for the rational breeding of lettuce cultivars with distinct levels of red pigments and green cultivars with high levels of health-promoting flavonoids.

item.title: RLL4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: LG9804161 Gene Symbol: RLL4 Gene Name: Red Lettuce Leaves 4 Genome: Lsat_Salinas_v8 Species: Lactuca sativa Functional Descriptions: The characterization of multiple polymorphic genes in this study provides the necessary molecular resources for the rational breeding of lettuce cultivars with distinct levels of red pigments and green cultivars with high levels of health-promoting flavonoids.
